Class KinematicPointAbstract

  • java.lang.Object
    • KinematicPointAbstract
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KinematicPointConstant, KinematicPointState

    public abstract class KinematicPointAbstract
extends java.lang.Object
    Project 5 Abstract class that aids in rendering two dimensional images from three dimensional points
    Version:
    11/26/17
    Author:
    Huy Vu and Olivia Cobble
